text: Good job. Pay is decent I  work from home Great opportunity for advancement. I was hired in 2011. It has long hours but it’s well worth the paycheck.
Great experience. Great perspective. Google fiber optics. Great place to get your cash and check out the next time you get it back in town thanks for sharing my wonderful experience
I really enjoyed working there. It was a great environment, had good food free lunch and made good money.. they had good people working there also. I loved it.
A good place to learn and apply your expertise. good experience.

text: Fun engaging corporate culture. Very mart people. Lots to learn across verticals and technologies. Overall best company I worked at o far. Recommend to anyone

text: like it , good food , fun place . leaving because my manager was terrible. recommendation: ask about your future boss and understand if they will hire someone between you and who you think will be your boss

It's not a startup anymore, but still an amazing place to work! You learn so much from working with such smart, driven people. And the principles of innovation have successfully created truly amazing products.
Google is a great place to work.  Respectful coworkers and management.  The promotions can be very competitive, but the requirements are clear.  Some of the smartest people I've ever worked with.
Google is a good work environment. There are a lot of perks and opportunities available to advance within the company. The culture is extremely positive and forward thinking.
Es un lugar de aprendizaje constante y desarrollo.
Great company to work for I hate that my assignment ended I would love to go back to Google this was a remote position and flexible wish I could go back to working for them

Google is respectful, well funded, and generally a great place to forward your career.  Pro: You may get to work on something that can change the world and get paid well for doing it.  Con: The company is far too large and opaque for you to make any difference in the company or understand the company as a whole. You will also very likely be forced into a niche where you will learn less and less as time goes on.
Great company culture, very entrepreneurial atmosphere.. Great amenities: free food, drinks, gym, play room, tea room etc  Tons of interesting projects, good tooling which easily available..
Great company with very good job work/ life balance. A lot of intelligent people here, that you can be studying together, solving hard problems together.
Considerada o melhor local do mundo para de trabalhar.
a great environment and managed company which additionally having a strong security system to avoid any possibility of data leaks to protect personal information and security.
Keep your voice down about politics and dont let them know anything about your side of thing when it comes to politics Dont work to fast but dont go to slow

Google is a great company to work for. However they use the loop whole of hiring temp employ and the never allowing them to get hired into the company. Which is to cut cost. Other then that the company’s a great company to work for.
They treat employees very bad and just a horrible company overall to work for with no value for their employees     They also don’t really want to help you succeed

Awesome innovation and care. When I worked for good it showed me that I could be some.body and working for them made me felt like a big percentage of help in the world due to the honor of working for a company so important.
Good workplace if you can tolerate ambiguity. I do not have much more to  disclose at this time. I am just filling in the minumum character count for this review.
